targets.query:
from(bucket: "CLNOC")
  |> range(start: -2h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface-ipv4v6")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "CLNOC-ASR1009-1" or r["device"] == "CLNOC-ASR1009-2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "HundredGigE2/1/0" or r["interface"] == "HundredGigE0/1/0" or r["interface"] == "TenGigabitEthernet1/1/8")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ipv4-in-octets" or r["_field"] == "ipv6-in-octets")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r._value) * 8}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: "CLNOC")
  |> range(start: -2h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface-ipv4v6")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ipv4-in-octets")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r._value) * 8}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: "CLNOC")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface-ipv4v6")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "CLNOC-ASR1009-1" or r["device"] == "CLNOC-ASR1009-2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "HundredGigE0/1/0" or r["interface"] == "TenGigabitEthernet1/1/8"  or r["interface"] == "HundredGigE2/1/0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ipv4-out-octets" or r["_field"] == "ipv6-out-octets")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r._value) * 8}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2m, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free_memory" or r["_field"] == "used_memory" or r["_field"] == "total_memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "CLNOC-ASR1009-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["subscription"] == "102")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
